name: @reecem/clockworks
description: Using timers and intervals in the webworker

scripts.version: PACKAGE_VERSION=$(cat package.json | grep \"version\" | head -1 | awk -F: '{ print $2 }' | sed 's/[",]//g' | tr -d '[[:space:]]')
scripts.postpublish: npm run version && git tag v$PACKAGE_VERSION && git push --tags

author: ReeceM
